pullrequest.title: Don't start model plugins on playback (issue #2427)

content.raw:
What changed from 8.2 to 8.3 (pull request #2608) is that model insertion during playback used to be parsed on [World::LogStep](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2608/process-insertions-and-deletions-on-gz-log/diff#Lgazebo/physics/World.ccF497T502), where `model->LoadPlugins()` was commented out, but now insertions are processed on `World::SetState`.

The commit you mentioned was part of the efforts to implement undo, which share the state functionality with playback. See pull request #2200.
content.html:
What changed from 8.2 to 8.3 (pull request #2608) is that model insertion during playback used to be parsed on World::LogStep, where model->LoadPlugins() was commented out, but now insertions are processed on World::SetState.

The commit you mentioned was part of the efforts to implement undo, which share the state functionality with playback. See pull request #2200.
